Class Invoice

public class Invoice extends Object

      public Invoice(LocalDate creationDate, LocalDate dueDate, Customer customer)
      Constructs an Invoice with creation date, due date, and customer
      Parameters:
      creationDate - The date the invoice is created
      dueDate - The date by which the invoice is due
      customer - The customer associated with the invoice
